title: Too much dodging
body:
In the very recent weeks, the amount of people dodging in the OCE servers have seemed to be increasing.

I'm not sure if it's just OCE, I haven't played on my EUWE account in a while, but even in PBE there's a lot less dodging than on OCE.

Not only this but now the queue times feel like they're a lot longer. 

At the moment, I've been queued for almost half an hour, been matched at least 7 times, been in about 5 lobbies, & all have resulted in perpetual dodging. 
My friends can also agree on experiencing the same thing. 


Not too long ago, around the time Poro King was active, I played ARAM with a team of my friends, & we laned a team of entirely bots. There's been an issue with bots in ARAM, & with the amount of dodging occurring in Normal Draft, I am starting to wonder if there's some kind of bot that joins a Draft queue just to dodge it. It sounds ridiculous but the sheer amount of dodging is even more ridiculous. 

.-. ?¿
